name: Quake: Xmas Jam 2020
summary:
Quake: Xmas Jam 2020 is a Quake map pack held annually.
It is currently the second biggest Quake map pack in file size, next to Arcane Dimension. This pack features 19 small maps in varying styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It runs on Arcane Dimensions 1.8 (included) and comes with some additional content like sounds, models, skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included.
